articles.title: Mutation in Brain's Immune Cells Linked to Alzheimer's Risk - Neuroscience News
articles.description: A genetic mutation affecting microglia, the brain's immune cells, can increase the risk of Alzheimer's disease up to threefold.

articles.title: Arginine or Hypertonic Saline–Stimulated Copeptin to Diagnose AVP Deficiency | NEJM - nejm.org
Potentiating glymphatic drainage minimizes post-traumatic cerebral oedema - Nature.com
articles.description: Acute oedema after traumatic brain injury is accompanied by the suppression of glymphatic and lymphatic fluid flow due to excessive systemic release of noradrenaline.
